message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a great asset to you as well. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $1,350,000. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, but I hope this offer will be favorable to both of us. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
